mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.product_code, o.out_date, o.order_count, o.plan_count, p.product_name, o.order_count - o.plan_count unplan_count FROM orders o, product p WHERE o.order_count != o.plan_count AND o.product_code = p.product_code AND o.out_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planDtS}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{planDtE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE prodplan SET plan_date = #{planDate}, plan_name = #{planName}, comments = #{comments}
UPDATE detailplan SET work_date = #{workDate}, plan_count = #{planCount} + #{workCount}, detail = #{detail}
